Carol for Chrome: Your Gateway to ChatGPT
Experience ChatGPT effortlessly through your browser with Carol. 

Absolutely free, no signup needed.

Quick ChatGPT Access via Search Bar
Simply type “O” before your question in the search bar to launch directly into a ChatGPT conversation. Transition from traditional Google searches to immediate chat interactions!

Universal ChatGPT Shortcut
Activate a new ChatGPT tab instantly with CTRL+SHIFT+O on Windows or CMD+SHIFT+O on Mac, accessible from anywhere.

Easy Contextual Interaction
Select and right-click any text on a webpage to send it to ChatGPT. Get context-specific insights in a single click.
